questions.questionText: Who is the only character in 'Avatar: The Last Airbender' who can bend all four elements?

options.description: Prince Zuko is a skilled firebender, but cannot bend all four elements.
Toph Beifong is a master earthbender, particularly known for inventing metalbending.
Aang, the protagonist of the series, is the Avatar and can bend all four elements.
Katara is a waterbending master from the Southern Water Tribe.

questions.answerDescription: Aang is the Avatar and can bend all four elements: water, earth, fire, and air.
